=PjSIP Compilation=

Get PjSIP from subversion repository:

`svn checkout http://svn.pjsip.org/repos/pjproject/trunk`

Configure pjsip without codec except G711 and GSM
{{{
./aconfigure --host=arm-apple-darwin8 --disable-sound --disable-speex-aec --
disable-l16-codec --disable-g722-codec --disable-speex-codec --disable-ilbc-code
c
}}}
